title: So snowday?
body:
So ive noticed the skins are on sale, I already got Snow Day Gnar.
But the snowdown showdown isnt in effect yet, Im sure ive missed it.
Sorry for that, but when is the date on the snowball legendary skin date?

replies.body:
Hello Yasei!

The Snowdown has just began!  I'm sure that the showdown (Legend of the Poro King) {{summoner:30}}  will be on later tonight/tomorrow morning.  As for the Legendary Snowball it will be available from **23/12 - 08/1**.  For more information about this year's Snowdown you can visit the Official Snowdown webpage [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-coming).  Hope this helps!

 {{summoner:31}}  Xhantea

_(22:00 AEST) Edit: As of this edit Legend of the Poro King is now live!_
